description:
Stanton House have partnered a $100m+ cybersecurity company to help build their Strategic Sales team. This Pre-IPO cybersecurity player are known for their strong leadership, hypergrowth over the last 4 years and strong pedigree of investors. They have been acquisitive and are targeting an IPO in the next 18-24 months.

As a Major Accounts Sales Director, you will target $5bn+ logos and we are considering candidates in Midwest/ Great Lakes (excluding Chicago), Ohio Valley, MidAtlantic, and Northeast.

What we are looking for?
• 5-10 years minimum selling complex cybersecurity solutions to Enterprise customers.
• You will have several examples of landing $3bn+ logos in the last years.
• A proven track record closing multimillion dollar deals.

Why would you be interested?
• You will be joining a top company in their segment, with a genuine shot at an IPO in the next couple of years. You'll get stock options, that actually could materialize into something!
• The highest growth sales team within this company, closing the biggest accounts and therefore having the biggest impact on ARR growth.
• They're paying up to $350,000 OTE 50/50, with a 6 month ramp, and they're offering an aggressive commission plan.
